channel.title: Need this:
channel.description:
Anyone got a simple counter that allows you to click an up arrow to add 1 and a down arrow to subtract 1? Some kind of counter. I tried googling it and all I get is "Fr33 w3b c0unt3rs f0r j00r s1te!!!111".
All help is appreciated.
EDIT: Something like whats in swift switch (Or at least back when I used it).

item.title: Need this:

Going to scan it first. (No offense, I’m just paranoid.)

EDIT: Yes! It’s exactly what I needed! Thank you!
